body.name: Farberware Countertop Microwave 1100 Watts, 1.2 cu ft - Smart Sensor Microwave Oven With LED Lighting and Child Lock - Perfect for Apartments and Dorms - Easy Clean Black Interior, Stainless Steel

features: CONVENIENT MICROWAVE: Prepare quick and easy meals in a snap with our powerful microwave. It packs 1100 of output power and features a range of settings for press-and-go speed.

POWERFUL SETTINGS: This microwave has ten power levels with multi-stage cooking. You can fully customize your cooking with six one-touch options, including popcorn, potato, and pizza. Defrost by weight or by time settings to make quick work of any task.

PERFECT SIZE: Measuring 1.2 cu ft, this microwave is the ideal small-space solution that offers full-sized cooking in a compact space. It features an easy-to-clean interior and exterior and is perfect for the home or office.

ALL YOU NEED: This microwave has a clear LED display with a kitchen timer and clock that lets you easily keep track of time. Easy-to-view interior lighting lets you keep an eye on your dish, and a child safety lock adds additional security.
FARBERWARE: From weeknight favorites to family feasts they'll never forget, Farberware helps today's families craft the meals that make memories and bring everyone together.
body.description: This microwave oven is the ideal size for office break rooms or home kitchens. One-touch cooking programs let you cook six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose from ten power levels up to 1100. The large digital screen has a clock feature and can display a countdown timer in addition to the remaining cook time. The memory function lets you customize and save your favorite settings, and the large door has an easy-grip handle and child-safety lock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the Farberware Countertop Microwave with 1100 Watts of power, and it has proven to be an efficient and reliable addition to my kitchen. Here's a comprehensive review based on my experience:Powerful Performance:The 1100 Watts of power packed into this Farberware Countertop Microwave ensures rapid and efficient cooking. Whether reheating leftovers, cooking frozen meals, or preparing quick snacks, the microwave's high wattage significantly reduces cooking time, making it a time-saving appliance.Spacious Interior:The microwave features a spacious interior that accommodates a variety of dish sizes. The turntable rotates smoothly, ensuring even cooking and eliminating the need for constant manual intervention. The generous capacity is particularly convenient when preparing larger meals or when hosting gatherings.User-Friendly Controls:Farberware has designed this microwave with user-friendly controls, making it accessible to users of all skill levels. The intuitive keypad and digital display simplify the programming of cooking times and power levels. Additionally, the quick-start function provides a hassle-free way to begin cooking without navigating through complex settings.Multiple Cooking Options:The microwave offers a range of cooking options, including various power levels and preset cooking functions. From defrosting frozen foods to cooking delicate dishes, the versatility of this appliance caters to different culinary needs. The sensor cooking feature intelligently adjusts cooking times based on the food's moisture and temperature.Sleek Design:The Farberware Countertop Microwave boasts a sleek and modern design that adds a touch of sophistication to the kitchen. The stainless steel finish is not only visually appealing but also easy to clean, maintaining the microwave's aesthetic appeal over time.Express Cook Feature:The express cook feature is a standout, allowing for quick and straightforward cooking with a single touch. This feature is particularly convenient for those moments when you need a fast meal or snack without the need for elaborate settings.Reliability and Durability:I have been impressed with the reliability and durability of this Farberware microwave. It has consistently delivered consistent performance without any issues. The build quality reflects Farberware's commitment to producing reliable kitchen appliances.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Farberware Countertop Microwave with 1100 Watts is a stellar kitchen appliance that combines powerful performance, spacious capacity, user-friendly controls, and a sleek design. Whether you're a culinary enthusiast or someone looking for a reliable microwave for daily use, this Farberware model stands out as an excellent choice. I highly recommend the Farberware Countertop Microwave to anyone seeking a high-quality and efficient microwave for their kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good microwave
reviews.reviewText: I used a different brand microwave for the last 5-10 years, each microwave lasted about 5 years. I decided to try a different brand, so I bought the Farberware because it was the same size as our other micrwaves 2.2 cu ft. A new appliance takes a bit of getting used to, as the controls are different than your previous one. At first I didn't like this microwave because you have to press the cook time button before entering the cooking time, because the first six digits on the number pad are quick start times (1 min, 2 min, 3 min etc). That is the only feature I didn't like. The start button is automatically 30 seconds, which I use more than any other time. The memory button is easy to set up to input specific times. Simply pressing the 1 on the number pad starts the microwave for 1 minute without pressing a start button, which is great. The microwave cooks incredibly even - way better than any microwave I've had in the past. I like the darker interior and this microwave is QUIET!!! Definitely a 5 star microwave and a definite recommend...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Packed well which is a good thing since there was some damage to the exterior of the box. We just use the microwave for the usual stuff. Works perfectly. There's a lot of technology and value here for the price point. Interior light is subdued but effective enough. People nitpick about the non-illuminated keypad but the numbers are located in the same formation as anything else has been for decades so that's automatic to get used to easy peasy. Strong enough, interior big enough. A bargain for this price point. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dangerously imperfect technology
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: The grill function shorted out exactly 2 years after I got it, burning out a ground fault interrupter in the process. The electrician’s bill was higher than the price of the oven. Good thing I had a gfi! When I removed it from the counter, I also discovered the mess in the photo. The oven is too heavy to move regularly to clean, although I did wipe up the counter under the edge of the door fairly often and wondered where the stuff I wiped was coming from. I bought it mostly to avoid having both a toaster oven and a microwave on my counter. It made halfway decent light toast from a frozen slice, although that took 11 minutes, and the Combi setting was helpful for crisping the edges of pie crust on reheated quiche. (Both of those things can be done better and faster by an air fryer that I bought more recently. An air fryer is just a convection oven with a small footprint - who knew?) The interior light never worked. BOTTOM LINE: having tried two combinations ovens from two different manufacturers, I conclude that combining a microwave with an oven function is a technology not yet perfected. At least the price of this one wasn’t as high as the first one!ORIGINAL POSTI just got this, replacing a convection microwave whose heating element died. It was a great price, under $100 - I don’t know whether that will remain in effect. Controls are much simpler than the convection/microwave unit, which was ridiculously complicated. I haven’t tried to clean it, but it looks ordinary. The four stars reflect a very minimal interior light and, especially, a really inadequate manual, especially concerning the grill. I want to toast bread - my old oven took 10 minutes to defrost and just barely crisp a slice of frozen bread on grill feature, with no browning. This oven has a Grill setting and 2 Combi grill and microwave functions. No information about how to use the Combi settings or how they differ.Fairly extensive online research suggests preheating the grill for 1 minute. The grill and oven definitely get hot, leading to risk of skin burns (!) if you touch the interior or the metal grill after using the Grill feature. Grilling a slice of frozen bread without preheating is slower than a toaster would be. The combo alternates microwave with grill function (both the sound and the lighted icons indicate this), but the bread is tough and not yet browned. There appear to be 2 levels of Combi, but I have no idea why.TOAST TEST: good news! When I Grill a frozen piece of bread for 8 minutes, the top is slightly crisp and the bottom is moist like fresh bread. After 12 minutes, the top (facing the roof, where there is an oven-type element) is slightly brown. Perfect light toast color and crunch. The underside is slightly crisp although not brown. Flipping mid-cycle may result in equal sides but I haven’t tried that. CAUTION: Use tongs or risk serious burns.Combi is not useful, overcooks the bread in the center and leaves it tough. It’s probably great for thawing and “browning” a frozen pizza or casserole. I have not seen evidence that the metal grill rack gets hot enough to leave marks on the food - maybe with more time.

This is the best microwave I’ve ever owned. I’ve bought a couple through the years. When my first one died after it had done its time, I bought another one to replace it. It actually defrosts well and cooks food evenly. The only thing I don’t like is after several years of use the plastic coating on the key pad starts to lift.
Il n a fonctionné que quelques fois et je ne l a que depuis 3 mois…. Et il ne chauffe plus très déçue !!!!
Nice big microwave. Quiet. Been good so far
Great little microwave with grill option, works great with frozen pizza!
Excelente compra. Cumple satisfactoriamente con nuestras expectativas.
